title: Marketplace Tech for Friday, May 29, 2015
description: Airing on Friday, May 29, 2015: First up, we talk to Sarah Jeong, a tech journalist who has been following the trial of convicted Silk Road drug trafficker Ross Ulbricht. Plus, Molly Wood, Marketplace’s Senior Tech Correspondent, talks about Google’s latest move to make its Android operating system your personal assistant. And how well have you kept up with the week in tech news? It's time for Silicon Tally! This week, host Ben Johnson takes on Glenn Fleishman, tech journalist, co-host of the Macworld podcast and two time Jeopardy! Champion.
